endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available health insurance policies.
Submit policy details to validate coverage status in real time.
Retrieve the status of submitted insurance claims.
Submit a new insurance claim for a patient's medical services.
Update the details of an existing insurance claim.
Delete an existing insurance claim from the system.
Retrieve coverage details for a specific health insurance policy.
Register a new healthcare provider in the system.
Fetch claim and coverage history for a specific patient.
Retrieve aggregated statistics regarding claim submissions and their outcomes.
